application.name: AstroImpact (UDP/IPv4)
application.summary: A multi-player space game, defend the planet from the incoming asteroids!

description.p: Play with friends online to defend the planet! Longest time to first impact or longest time to 100% damage. You destroy asteroids by flying into them before they hit the planet!

ul.li: Use W,A,S,D,Q,E,SPACE & LEFT SHIFT to move around.
L-ALT / Mouse 3/4 Click to Instant Brake.
Escape / Left Click to free mouse focus.
